create_chatbot.description: Create a new chatbot using a template or from scratch.

send_message.description: Send a message to the chatbot and receive an AI response.

props.name: message
props.description: The message to send to the AI

props.name: temperature
props.description: Controls randomness (0 = focused, 1 = creative). Default is 0.

props.name: instructions
props.description: Additional instructions to tailor the AI response

new_contact.description: Triggers when a new contact or lead is collected by the chatbot.

new_conversation.description: Triggers when a new conversation is started by a customer.
